scripts.postinstall: yarn run postinstall_core && yarn run postinstall_substrate_rpc && yarn run postinstall_polkascan && yarn run postinstall_make_links
scripts.postinstall_core: cd projects/core && yarn install && cd .. && ng build core
scripts.postinstall_substrate_rpc: cd projects/substrate-rpc && yarn install && cd .. && ng build substrate-rpc
scripts.postinstall_polkascan: cd projects/polkascan && yarn install && cd .. && ng build polkascan
scripts.build: ng build core && concurrently "ng build substrate-rpc" "ng build polkascan"
scripts.watch: ng build core && concurrently "ng build substrate-rpc --watch" "ng build polkascan --watch" "sleep 20 && ng build core --watch"
